      • move

        public void move(World world,
                 Player player,
                 double delta)
        Move toward the player if the player is within 150 pixels of the monster and attacks if the player is within 50 pixels of the monster
        Specified by:
        move in class Monster
        Parameters:
        world - The world that the monster will move in
        player - The player that the monster is attempting to attack if it is within range
        delta - The amount of time that has passed (in milliseconds)

      • interact

        public void interact(Player player,
                     boolean attemptingInteraction)
        Subtracts damage from the monster's hp, and sets the runaway timer
        Parameters:
        player - The player with which the object will interact
        attemptingInteraction - A boolean indicating whether the player is attempting to interact with the object
